description: Singaporeans are spending more on longer holidays and more exotic destinations. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Singaporeans are travelling more, longer and farther. What is driving the travel boom?
title_page: Singaporeans are travelling more, longer and farther. What is driving the travel boom? | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ The breathtaking beauty of the Aegean Sea beckons. Come April, I will be packing my bags to Santorini and other Greek islands.
In January 2023, I spent Chinese New Year battling the cold in central Japan, but loving every minute of the dreamy winterscape. In December 2023, I was in sunny Dubai admiring the extravagant architecture and screaming my heart out while dune bashing across the desert.
